attributes.action: Increase the proposed 1% pay increase for all NHS front line workers to 10%.
attributes.additional_details: Over the past twelve months Doctors, Nurses, Cleaners, Porters and other front line workers have endured fatigue to the point of exhaustion, stress in caring for the dying and ultimately given their lives to care for others.  The government has expressed gratitude on numerous occasions and now insults those people with a 1% pay rise. It is a National disgrace that Parliament must put right.
attributes.background: Properly reward the efforts of front line NHS workers who have shown extraordinary sacrifice, dedication and courage throughout the Covid pandemic.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
